projects.title: Classification of permuted images using Convolution Vision Transformer
description: Implemented Convolutional vision Transformer model and finetune on Oxford-IIIT Pets and ImageNette dataset.
Trained model to achieve an accuracy of 94.3% on Oxford-IIIT Pets and 99.7% on ImageNette datasets.
Trained and evaluated the model for classification from images with permuted patches.

projects.title: Perceptual grouping of image elements using hGRU network
description: Implemented a vision-inspired hGRU network for thesis that forms long-range spatial dependency between the image elements.
Performed hyperparameter search and achieved an accuracy of 98%.
Investigated the computation stream of the model to see if the model follows incremental grouping theory to group the image elements as done by human vision.

projects.title: Generating images from images using cGAN (Pix2Pix)
description: Implemented cGAN for colorizing black and white images, converting google maps to google earth, and converting building facades to real buildings.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
